com.asemantics.rdfcoder.model

Interface CodeModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CodeModelBase, JavaCodeModel, JenaCodeModel, SPARQLQuerableCodeModel, ValidatingCodeModel

    public interface CodeModel
    Defines the Code Model, that is a graph representing the Kabbalah model.
    Author:
    Michele Mostarda

    • Field Summary

        subject - the triple subject.
        predicate - the triple predicate.
        object - the triple object.

                         String[] values)

        predicate - the triple predicate.
        values - the triple values list.
